metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40942 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
In GPAC MP4Box v1.1.0, there is a heap-buffer-overflow in the functionfilter_parse_dyn_args function in filter_core/filter.c:1454, asdemonstrated by GPAC. This can cause a denial of service (DOS).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-40942` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2
gpac-modules-base - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2
libgpac11 - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: gpac package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.0+dfsg1-2').
